overview:
Sharad is the Business Head for Classifieds at releaseMyAd . releaseMyAd is an online Ad booking system which leverages the power of the Internet to improve the efficiency of booking Newspaper Classifieds in developing markets (South Asia) for SME’s & Individuals.

He is also involved with findMyMatch - India’s most effective online matrimonial service which attempts to directly connect offline ads with online customers. Know more at findMyMatch.in
